channel.title: Delta Sucks?!
channel.description:
I never used a other base, Only delta becaus i know alot about delta and i enjoy it. Why are people saying it is bad? Servers like Demise Pk 5 Arent that bad or are they?
Can someone please tell me a reason why i should switch to a PI or shit like that!
Thank you :D

item.title: Delta Sucks?!
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

LilXCj:

Delta is only bad when you use it incorrectly. Oh course, I would rather use a packaged source instead of a unpackaged source. But that’s because I don’t like using CTRL+F

Ok thank you. i stay on delta.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Sucks?!
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

[quote=“rash, post:40, topic:371300”][quote author=youridudock link=topic=467386.msg3417528#msg3417528 date=1291240420]

People say delta sucks because it is one of the most leeched servers of all time, until PI came out delta was really the only server you would see on the server status list…

But is Pi better then delta? Can you make better servers from it?
[/quote]

It all depends on who is making the server.
PI is more stable.[/quote]

If a server is based off of winterlove(which they both are), then it is shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Sucks?!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Pblord7:

If you can actually code the source well, Delta isn’t bad.

You still need to get the dust and dirt off of the base before it can be worth working with. By dust, I mean cleaning up methods, and by dirt, i mean cleaning out the dead/not-needed code.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Sucks?!
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

If Java had true garbage collection, Deltascape would delete itself upon execution. Nuff said.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Sucks?!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“ry60003333, post:28, topic:371300”]The problem is that the fundamental way that the WinterLove server is programmed is wrong, and this is because it was just a proof of concept. It follows none of the Java conventions and violates numerous recommendations by Sun, and people split the code into multiple classes to get around this limit:
http://java.sun.com/docs/books/jvms/second_edition/html/ClassFile.doc.html#88659

The other problem is that you actually have to know some basic Java in order to do anything with the other servers, so once you start on WinterLove you’ll find it very hard to move on.[/quote]
<3

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Sucks?!
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

The problem is that the fundamental way that the WinterLove server is programmed is wrong, and this is because it was just a proof of concept. It follows none of the Java conventions and violates numerous recommendations by Sun, and people split the code into multiple classes to get around this limit:
http://java.sun.com/docs/books/jvms/second_edition/html/ClassFile.doc.html#88659

The other problem is that you actually have to know some basic Java in order to do anything with the other servers, so once you start on WinterLove you’ll find it very hard to move on.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Sucks?!
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“John459, post:26, topic:371300”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=467386.msg3418575#msg3418575 date=1291324156]
If you hardly know anything I suggest Delta
[/quote]

That has to stop being suggested. Most people who start with winterlove will not move on past it. Maybe he should learn a little more then come back to rsps and work with more complex servers, or even possibly create his own.[/quote]

Okay thank you all (29 Reply’s -.-). I just stay with Delta and create a good server

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Sucks?!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“youridudock, post:24, topic:371300”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=467386.msg3418575#msg3418575 date=1291324156]
If you hardly know anything I suggest Delta, it will help you see the RS2 protocol and learn it, you should also at that time read up on Java and learn that, and then you should move on to one of the more complex frameworks like Hyperion.
[/quote]

Well where can i download a Hyperion? By download server section? Becaus i want to learn that. Bored on delta Atm.[/quote]

Yeah it’s in the download section, look the the topic “Base Servers”.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Sucks?!
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

Sanskrit:

Winterlove was originally created to test bots, never to hold a large amount of players or to be stable. The servers made to support these functions would be Hyperion (Graham, Blakeman8192), 317Serv (Yz85racer), Paragon (originally rs2dv written by Varek), pretty much anything that isn’ t based off of Winterlove’ s functions or process(). The only reason people still use Winterlove is because they are too lazy to learn how these new servers work, or simply don’ t have the time to do so.

What is the best for me to work with? Pi, Delta Etc.

Read full topic
